title: The Best Serum Deals to Shop on Vitamin C Day
text:
It’s
National Vitamin C Day, and in celebration of our brightening, collagen-boosting bestie, brands are dropping prices and giving free gifts you don’t want to miss. Able to combat signs of aging, vitamin C is a must-have step in your regular skin-care routine. And now is the perfect time to snag them!
Some of our favorite brands are shouting out some of our favorite formulas, but the clock is ticking on these special deals. We’ve collected our favorites so you can pack your cart with the best in brightening before time runs out!
The Top Vitamin C Day Sales
Timeless Skin Careis offering a treat for your skin with 40 percent off on April 4 with code VITC. Dermalogicais gifting their brightening trio, Powerbright Dark Spot Serum, BioLumin-C Serum, and Daily Glycolic Cleanser, on orders $75+. No code needed! TruSkin’ssale is on its entire Vitamin C skin-care collection. Running on Amazon only, the discounts will last through the end of the day today! Its best-selling Vitamin C Serum and SPF 30 Mineral Sunscreen with Vitamin C are up to 45 percent off. RoCis celebrating National Vitamin C Day with 15 percent off clinically proven Vitamin C skin care. SkinCeuticalsis also running a limited-time offer in celebration of Vitamin C Day. The gift of your choice of mini Vitamin C serum is a $91 value and is available on orders of $225 or more.
The Best in Vitamin C Products
TruSkin Vitamin C Face Serum ($22, usually $49)
TruSkin is offering 45 percent off its entire Vitamin C collection, and that includes the much-loved Vitamin C Face Serum, which has over 148,700 glowing
Amazon reviews. The hydrating formula also includes hyaluronic acid and aloe vera to soothe and refresh skin. SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic ($182)
A patented formula
loved by dermatologists, this serum improves the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, loss of firmness, and brightens skin’s complexion. 15 percent pure vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid) works to address skin concerns and protect skin from environmental damage. Create the ultimate vitamin C-powered skin-care routine with this key step and get your choice of mini vitamin C serum on orders of $225 or more. Dermalogica Biolumin-C Vitamin C Serum ($39)
If you’re filling your cart for those sweet free gifts, look no further than the Biolumin-C Vitamin C Serum. Packed with lactic acid, vitamin C and inflammation-reducing chia seed extract, this serum does the work without putting your skin through the ringer.
timeless Skincare 20% Vitamin C + E Ferulic Acid ($27, usually $35)
Brighten, boost and protect your skin with this bestselling 20% Vitamin C formula. With over 9,000 reviews, this serum is much-loved for the lightweight, non-greasy formula.
ROĆ x SJP Brightening Trio with Vitamin C (Sale price $75, usually $103)
Snag the exclusive skin-care set and bag, designed by
Sarah Jessica Parker, and powered by vitamin C. Including the Revive + Glow Serum, Eye Balm, and Moisturizer with SPF 30, this set tackles all your biggest pigmentation and fine line concerns.
